subNodes.conversationText: root
The troll reeks of carrion and decay. It is dribbling spittle and watching you hungrily.
Continue
This is bad.
Continue
You wrack your brains for a suitable ploy....
Continue

The troll grins, its teeth cracked and broken.

"<Race> awake? Gooood! You'll taste better when adrenaline is yer muscle..."

"Wait, troll!" You shout, starting to your feet. It looks at you with a curious expression, but stops... for the moment.

OK, so far so good. What now?
"I have powerful magic, and will destroy you if you step any closer!"
"I would like to make a deal with you."
"I will do a deal! Torkal eats <Race>. <Race> gets eaten. Ha ha!"
"There must be something I can do to help you?"
"Like what?"
"I could bring you gold!"
"Ha! What use has Torkal of gold?" The troll steps towards you hungrily.
"...and I'm also a wizard, with powerful magics that will destroy you!"
"I could find you food!"

The troll looks puzzled. "But you are food." 

It steps forward hungrily.
"...and I'm also a wizard, with powerful magics that will destroy you!"
"There's something you should know - I'm diseased."

The troll's eyes narrow. "What... what disease has the <Race> got?"

OK. Where to go with this.
[Bluff] "My blood is full of little worms called Quagis that are eating me from within."

"Kwaaa gis," the troll says slowly, stumbling over the word. "Eating the <Race> from within."

It mulls this over.

"Torkal eaten lots of worms. No problems so far. This is ok."
"No! No, er, because Quagis are magic worms!"
"Magic worms? Torkal never heard of magic worms before."
"You don't want to. They're big, they glow, and they have teeth like splintered rock!"
"Urgh! Horrid magic worms. Torkal will cook them out of you!"
"No, heat makes them explode!"

The troll pauses, scratching its head. "Exploding... magic... worms."

It spits. "This all sounds pretty stupid. Torkal not sure he believes you."
"...and I'm also a wizard, with powerful magics that will destroy you!"
"They make everything taste like stones!"

"Urgh. Torkal eats stones when hungry. Not nice."

The troll pauses, scratching its head. "This all sounds pretty stupid. Torkal not sure he believes you."
"... and I'm also a wizard, with powerful magics that will destroy you!"
"Did I say worms? I meant wasps! Lots of wasps!"

"Wasps!" Torkal spits, and looks around suspiciously. "Hate wasps. Wasps everywhere. Nearly as bad as squirrels."

It scratches its head. "This all sounds pretty stupid. Torkal not sure he believes you."
"...and I'm also a wizard, with powerful magics that will destroy you!"
"....er and I'm also a wizard, so stand back!"
[Bluff] "My brain is shrinking because of a disease called Cantancois."

The troll shrugs with visible relief. "Oh, that doesn't sound to bad. Small brain is no bother." 

It starts towards you again.
"... and and er this means that anyone who eats me will get the same thing, and their brains will turn to mush!"

The troll pauses. "Mush, eh."

It considers. You hold your breath. It picks its nose, with a far away look on its face.

"Ok," it says finally. "Prove it."
"...er, 'prove it'? Prove it how?"
"Cut yer head open. I want to see your small brain."
"I'm not showing you my brain!"

"<Race> has no disease!" snorts the troll. "its a nasty trick!"

It eyes you hungrily.
"...er and I'm also a wizard, with powerful magics that will destroy you!"
"But you don't have anything to compare it to. How will you know whether it is small? Everything looks small to you."
The troll reflects. "The <Race> is very small," it concedes finally. "But this all sounds very stupid. Torkal not sure he belives you."
"...and I'm also a wizard, with powerful magics that will destroy you!"
"... wait! That's not everything. I've also got... er I don't know... an ingrowing toenail."
"A toenail? Growing inwards?" The troll grimaces. "That's bloody disgusting that is."
"Er yeah, and its covered in puss and blood and skank and its just utterly grim, I'm telling you!"

"Mmmm, puss," the troll smiles happily. "Blood. Its sounding better now."

It frowns suddenly. "Why can't I eat you again?"
"...and I'm also a powerful wizard with magics that will destroy you!"
"Its all kinds of wrong, believe me."
"Perhaps I could just cut the <Race>'s leg off, and eat the rest of the <Race>. Yes. That would do it."
"No! Err, no, because the toenail is only the first sign. Actually, all of me is ingrowing!"
"An ingrowing <Race>!" The troll looks repulsed. It reflect for a moment. "This sounds pretty stupid. Torkal not sure he believes the <Race>."
"...and I'm also a powerful wizard with magics that will destroy you!"
"But what it you ate the leg by mistake?"
The troll scratches its head. "Well. I wouldn't do that."
"But what if you did? If you had lots of legs one day and ate the wrong one?"
The troll reflects. "You do sound like a grim <Race>." It scratches its head. "But this all sounds pretty stupid. Torkal not sure he believes the <Race>."
"...and I'm also a powerful wizard with magics that will destroy you!"
"....and I'm also a wizard, with powerful magics that can destroy you!"
